body.name: Puffs Plus Lotion Facial Tissue (Old)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 36 mins.
features: Pack includes 10 Cubes (52 Tissues per Cube) of Puffs Plus Lotion Facial Tissues
Puffs softest, most cushiony tissue, with a touch of lotion, to help protect your nose
Puffs Plus Lotion helps soothe irritated noses by locking in moisture better than regular tissues
Don't let your runny nose run out of Puffs. Sign up for automatic home delivery and save
Dermatologist tested to be gentle on sensitive skin
Don't irritate your nose during cold & flu; be ready with soothing Puffs Plus Lotion
body.description: Puffs is so soft, your nose knows the difference. Protect your nose from ordinary tissues by choosing Puffs and skipping the sore nose issues. Puffs Plus Lotion is our most soothing facial tissue with lotion. It is the perfect tissue for when sore or runny noses need some extra softness for any cold, flu, or other issue. Puffs Plus Lotion facial tissues lock in moisture better, to help soothe irritated skin commonly caused from rough or thin tissues. It's no wonder that Puffs Plus Lotion is America's #1 selling Lotion Tissue brand. A nose in need deserves Puffs indeed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these tissues plus lotion for their incredible softness, it would be great if Puffs made toilet paper as well, using the same soft tissue plus lotion.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The box’s of tissues were fine.
reviews.reviewText: The tissues were fine but this order wasn’t left in my mailbox. The box was huge my mail is isn’t big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product that travels well!
reviews.reviewText: Puffs are my favorite small size box tissue, for use in every room of my house! The price was very reasonable - well below the price of outher similar products. Special care is given in the packing and shipping of the product. Mine arrived with no squished boxes, in excellent condition - one of those things I can store easily for use in the future, as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These tissues saved my life!
reviews.reviewText: Well, that may have been an overstatement. They're OK. Happy with what I received for the money they cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Pack includes 10 Cubes (52 Tissues per Cube) of Puffs Plus Lotion Facial Tissues We all need tissues, and it seems I run out at the most inopportune times. It is cool and dry in my area, I have the heat on. My nose gets stuffed, and I use nose drops. I take allergy medication, and my nose stops running. However, the next day it starts all over again..Puffs Plus is the #1 selling Lotion Tissue, I have read. It is true that they are soft and feel cushiony. They seem to soothe my irritated nose, no stiff tissues to scrape my nares, but soft tissues. In this package I have 10 boxes of tissues, true the boxes of tissues seem to be fewer than previously, but the info says there are 52 tissues to each box.They feel soft to my nose. They are sturdy, so these tissues are the ones I turn to.Recommended. prisrob 12-17-18

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A picky mom
reviews.reviewText: I’m not influenced by named brands. I’m one of those moms who buys 3 or 4 different brands of the same household items in one shopping trip, just to compare the quality. I keep coming back to Puffs tissues. Even tried a couple of other brands that also had lotion in them. Still settled on Puffs. Even my husband agrees that the tissues with the lotion in them really do make a difference. As I write this, I am just recovering from a very nasty cold, the only thing worse than this monster cold would have been the flu. The whole bottom half of my face was chapped from a runny nose and watery eyes. These puffs made a big difference. I should know because I used a different brand while away from home and my face paid for it, flared up redder than before. I just want to say how grateful I am for the affordable Amazon Subscriptions because a fresh box of these arrived at my door just as I was about to run out, and I had forgotten all about them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Softer than Kleenex. Doesn’t make my nose red
